To: "radiance-general"<radiance-general at radiance-online.org>;


Thanks to Roland Schregle, Greg Ward, and Nathaniel Jones, Radiance is now building and working on Windows again, including the photon map stuff. Installers for Windows (32bit), MacOS (Universal), and Linux (32 and 64bit) are all available here:

https://github.com/NREL/Radiance/releases/tag/5.0.a.2

Sweet! Trace on.

- Rob
